resources.string: Looks interesting?\n\nYou can attempt match to know if you would go togethor.
Tap on an option and swipe the card for next question!

Match Success!

Congrats we believe you will be able to make it work!

 We will notify the other person and you can then connect if she agrees!
Or rewind to reanswer by tapping on left arrow below!
Sorry Match Failed\n\nYou guys have different tastes, we don\'t think it would be a very good idea!
You can do changes later, continue?
Everything here runs with \ndrops, the more the better, \ntap to buy more drops when needed
Tap to change location \nco-ordinates or city.
Tap on a profile to \nlike, message or attempt cheers, double tap to view profile.
Tap here to filter \nresults according to you need
